education.institution: Brahma Valley College of Engineering & Research Institute of Pune University
education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering (Computer Science and Engineering) with 57.86%

responsibilities: Configure and Install various network devices and services (e.g. routers, switches, firewalls, desktop, VPN, QoS).
Install computer networks such as local area network (LANs), wide area networks (WANs), the Internet and other data communications system
Perform network maintenance and system upgrades including services packs, patches and security configurations
Monitor performance and ensure system availability and reliability
Provide level-1/2 support and troubleshooting to resolve issues
Assembling and disassembling the computer, Cabling
Installing and Configuring all Windows and Windows Server 2008 & 2012
Managing and Administrating all user domain and accounts
